WorkItem.Description:
For some odd reason, I can run this program just fine in full-screen, but when I want to run it in Windowed mode, the DOSBox displays a completely green window. I checked DOSBox by launching it alone, and it runs just fine, so it seems that Turbco C++ is somehow utilizing it incorrectly.

OS: Windows 10 64-bit
Program OS: 64-bit

Comments.Message: It's really weird issue. I'm also using Windows 10 64-bit, never seen this before. Can you please tell me your System Name and Model (or Configuration if custom build PC) so I can check Turbo C++ with same configuration system.

Certainly! Thanks for taking a look at this post. I searched for a solution to this extensively, but to no avail, so I appreciate it.

System: Toshiba Qosmio X775-Q7380

It's a gaming laptop my parents purchased for me back in 2011 as a graduation gift. It has the same specs listed [here](http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16834214490).
